states.label: Back to top button out of nav:Custom Icon Selected
Back to top button out of nav:hover

default.source:
<style>

@keyframes scroll-in {
  0% {
  opacity: 0;
    transform: translate3d(0px, 50px, 0px);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);
  }
  100% {
  opacity: 1;
    transform: none;
  }
}

</style>

en.code: "Discover the TropiQ beverage brand through a vibrant website that reflects its exotic drinks"

fr.code: "Découvrez la marque de boisson TropiQ à travers un site web coloré, en harmonie avec ses boissons exotiques"

en.code: "This website was designed to showcase a car model while highlighting its aesthetics"

fr.code: "Ce site a été conçu pour mettre en valeur un modèle de voiture, tout en mettant l’accent sur son esthétique"

en.code: "We collaborated with this surf company to design a website that reflects their brand and services."

fr.code: "Nous avons collaboré avec cette compagnie de surf pour concevoir un site web reflétant leur image et leurs services"

en.code: "We imagined and designed the website for the Multimedia Integration program at Collège de Maisonneuve"
